title: RP DECLINE
body: it all started when i spent 20 euros on  RP everything went just fine  fine i got my 3250 Rp but i could still afford more so i went to bought 2.50 euros and it kept declining my card and took 2.5 euro away from my card and no rp was given back .please look into this! my plans were on buying championship riven and transfering to euw but i am 300 rp away from transferring, and its totally unfair that i cant do anything about it.

replies.body:
As *Declined* and *Hyperion3182* mentioned, you'll definitely want to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our billing specialists can investigate and find out what happened. We'll be able to work with you one-on-one to resolve this together.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Greetings panty slippers,


Account sensitive information is unsuited for boards.
As we can't assist you with these sort of issues on the Boards, we suggest you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support. They'll be able to look into the issue and give you further assistance.

Couldn't help noticing the headline ^_^

Hello, we can't debate about real money issues on the Boards because it involves sensitive information about your credit card. Best thing to do is to send a request to Player support and explain the whole situation with as many details as possible.
